AnycastIpList.description: An Anycast static IP list. For more information, see [Request Anycast static IPs to use for allowlisting](https://docs.aws.amazon.com/AmazonCloudFront/latest/DeveloperGuide/request-static-ips.html) in the *Amazon CloudFront Developer Guide*.

AnycastIps.description: The static IP addresses that are allocated to the Anycast static IP list.

Arn.description: The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of the Anycast static IP list.

Id.description: The ID of the Anycast static IP list.

IpCount.description: The number of IP addresses in the Anycast static IP list.

LastModifiedTime.description: The last time the Anycast static IP list was modified.

Name.description: The name of the Anycast static IP list.

Status.description: The status of the Anycast static IP list. Valid values: ``Deployed``, ``Deploying``, or ``Failed``.

Tag.description: A complex type that contains ``Tag`` key and ``Tag`` value.

Key.description:
A string that contains ``Tag`` key.
 The string length should be between 1 and 128 characters. Valid characters include ``a-z``, ``A-Z``, ``0-9``, space, and the special characters ``_ - . : / = + @``.

Value.description:
A string that contains an optional ``Tag`` value.
 The string length should be between 0 and 256 characters. Valid characters include ``a-z``, ``A-Z``, ``0-9``, space, and the special characters ``_ - . : / = + @``.

Tags.description: A complex type that contains zero or more ``Tag`` elements.

Items.description: A complex type that contains ``Tag`` elements.

description: An Anycast static IP list. For more information, see [Request Anycast static IPs to use for allowlisting](https://docs.aws.amazon.com/AmazonCloudFront/latest/DeveloperGuide/request-static-ips.html) in the *Amazon CloudFront Developer Guide*.

IpCount.description: The number of IP addresses in the Anycast static IP list.

Name.description: The name of the Anycast static IP list.

Tags.description: A complex type that contains zero or more ``Tag`` elements.
